title: The Breach (Part 1)
body:
It all began with the Star Containment Unit, and when we placed a Star inside it. This was such a bad idea....I told them it wouldn't work. I said it would break. But they didn't listen. They never do. But, it's too late now. The subjects have all been teleported to the new dimension, designated 'Minecraftia'. This place has it all - resources, pocket dimensions, even immortality!
	Our experiment is going well, the search for life has begun. Hopefully, we'll find something out here.
	(There's a note attached to this, it says 'Experiment Log of Dr. Wynter, Entry 1â€™)
